content: this super scarf crochet patterns is perfect for beginners it only uses two types of stitches and is repetitive the texture and color options make it a great fit for so many people this can be made for women men craft shows christmas gifts holiday gifts and my favorite selfish crocheting i used 2 skeins of lion brand color made easy in huckleberry and a 11 50/p crochet hook the pattern is free on my blog and there is a video tutorial as well
